item.description:
Have you ever been on a road trip that has changed your life, or had a conversation of a lifetime in the front seat of your car? For many their car is an extension of personal identity, a symbol of freedom and adventure, and a place to build lasting relationships. Using the car as the vehicle of human experience, tell us your tale. We welcome any and all compelling stories with a car connection! Not sure what to say? Try these ideas for inspiration…

  • Learning to drive: who taught you, how did you feel?
  • Meaningful Moments and Conversations behind the Wheel
  • Trips of a lifetime: Been lost, stuck, or stumbled onto an interesting place? We want to hear about it.
  • The Driver’s Seat: Tales of Empowerment & Triumph

Don’t Limit yourself! Tell your story your way. Storytelling it all forms is welcome at the Larz Anderson Auto Museum.

Admission is $10.00

Pre-registered storytellers are free.

For more information please visit: http://larzanderson.org/events/lectures/motormouth/

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: MotorMouth: A Vehicle of Human Experience
